content.prompt: Progressivism, as described in the excerpt, has the most in common with which of the following later domestic policy initiatives?

choices.label: President Lyndon Johnson’s protection of voting rights during the Great Society
President Bill Clinton’s changes to welfare policy
President Herbert Hoover’s support for increased tariffs during the Great Depression

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
